mapper.update: update t_blog set where id like CONCAT('%', #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
update t_blog set where id like CONCAT( #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'%')
update t_blog set where id like CONCAT('%', #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'%')
update t_blog set where id = true
update t_blog set where id = false
update t_blog set where UPPER(id) = UPPER(#{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
